dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT it.item_xid commodity, it.description commodity_description, it_feat.item_feature_value blend, glog_util.remove_domain(it_feat.item_feature_qual_gid) warehouse, to_char(from_tz(CAST(it_feat.effective_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY') start_date, to_char(from_tz(CAST(it_feat.expiration_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY') end_date, glog_util.remove_domain(COALESCE(it_feat.update_user, it_feat.insert_user)) blend_creator, to_char(from_tz(COALESCE(CAST(it_feat.update_date AS TIMESTAMP), CAST(it_feat.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP)), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY') date_entered FROM item_feature it_feat LEFT JOIN item it ON it_feat.item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE NOT it_feat.item_feature_qual_gid IN ('DESCRIPTION','REVISION','SUPPLIER_CONFIG_ID','SUPPLIER_ITEM','TYPE') AND NOT it_feat.item_feature_qual_gid LIKE '%CERT%' ORDER BY it_feat.item_feature_qual_gid, it_feat.item_gid
